properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 3:45AM EST until February 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 knots and waves 4 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Mexico Bay
to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM EST WEDNESDAY
